abstract: Stuart Dunnings III, Democratic prosecutor of Ingham County, Michigan for nearly 20 years, resigns after being charged with soliciting services of prostitutes, along with his brother Steven, who is a lawyer; both men have pleaded not guilty.
lead_paragraph: The prosecutor of Ingham County said that he had resigned after being charged with hiring prostitutes hundreds of times and paying for sex with a woman who wanted help in a child custody dispute.

headline.main: Michigan: Longtime Prosecutor Resigns After Charges That He Hired Prostitutes
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Longtime Prosecutor Resigns After Charges That He Hired Prostitutes
